release.action: New format was introduced for component/subsystem documentation, with obligatory "Description" and "Browse" sections (the latter with links to JavaDoc, XRef & CVS log) and "Dependencies" (components/jars). "Constructor parameters" section is given for every IoC 3 component. Other sections are included as necessary, and links to config schemata, and example files (through cvsview) are added to "Browse" section where applicable.
FileSystemProvider implementations were moved to org.objectledge.filesystem package, as they are accessed by the casual users - they should not be forced to look into impl packages.

FileSystem.getResource(String) method returns now actual URL pointing to the found files, as returned by the providers. These URLs can be safely serialized as Strings, and deserialized in any context. This allows using them as InputSource systemIds, with correct semantics.
XMLValidator API was changed so that it accepts URLs not FS paths. This makes XMLValidator independent of FileService, but retaining the functionality, thanks to FileService.getResource() method.
XMLValidator is now compatible with Crimson and Xerces parsers, Saxon is not required any longer.
FileSystemProvider implementations were moved to org.objectledge.filesystem package, as they are accessed by the casual users - they should not be forced to look into impl packages.
More tests for Filesystem has been written.
Multiple character blocks with a single tag are now handled correctly by i18n xml loader.
More tests for StringUtils have been written.
Test for ErrorHandlingPipeline have been improved.
Test for ContextToolFactory have been improved.
FileAppender and RollingFileAppender implementations working over Ledge FS are now available.
LoggingConfigurator has been enhanced to pico-instantiate certain Log4J components, making components in Ledge container available for their initializaiton.
Ledge was updated to compile against pico 1.0-beta-4 (superceded by later changes)
Quirsk in commandline processing were removed thanks to migration to commons-cli.
LedgeServletTest.testLedgeServlet2 testcase was removed, because of it was causing problems, and was essentialy an integration and not unit test.
uploadLimit property was moved to the proper place - FileUpload configuration.
HttpContext was briefly documented.
Ledge web documentation was reorganized.
ThreadPool was implemented using commons-pool.
Tests for policy package were added.
Strings can be now defined outside of any prefix defined inside i18m xml file - prefix defined by file name applies to those.
Build system was upgraded to use pre-1.0 maven.
Stack trace formatter was ported in, and adapted to use JDK1.4+ features.
Stack trace prettyprinting was added to PrintExceptionValve and ExceptionReriderctorValve.
Stack trace prettyprinting was plugged into Ledge's Log4J loggers.
ConfigurationFactory was moved into ledge-components module. It's needed by some components and it's useful in component tests.
ConfigurationFactory was split into part handling configuration loading, and part hanling associating configuration with components.

LoggingConfigurator was moved into ledge-components module. A component may depend on it to request that logging be initialized before the component is constructed. Useful if instantiating the component causes massive logging from dependant 3rd party objects.
ledge.root system property is no longer needed for tests
TestSuite classes were removed. Test are looked up easily withouthem both by Maven and Eclipse.
DatabaseContext was fixed to create subcontexts with correct ids.
Unicode characters are correctly passed around int POST and GET requests, and links are generated encoded aproprietly.
All Java and Velocity source files were transcoded into UTF-8, and apropriate settings were applied for the build system and Eclipse.
HTML entities sent by the browser are decoded into unicode characters in parameters.
Unicode characters not mappable to the chosen output encoding are transformed into HTML entities.
Table filters are now stored in the tool not the state objects. Fixes problems with temporary momory leakage.
LinkTool uses custom url encoder to avoid encoding / in the query string.
LinkTool was stripped from unsed code reorganized for better maintainablitiy.
I18n strings can be defined in intermediate nodes in addition to leaf nodes.
All old issues were scheduled among releases.
Table toolkit parmeters were changed into camelCase.
LinkTool was fixed with respect to extensibility.
I18n tool was fixed with respect to extensibility.
SecuirtyHelper is no longer refernced statically, allowing more flexibility and extensibility.
I18n context border cases were worked out.
New roadmap document was prepared.
Jira house cleaning was performed including setting components and versions on all issues, closing resolved issues and sheduling issues among releases.
Dev version docs were generated with Maven 1.0 with some adjustments and published on the web.
Maven release management tools were used to do the release for the first time.
changes.xml files were reorganized and filled in from jira.
